item.title: AAP Counters ACIP Guidance in New Immunization Schedule
item.description: Immunization schedule contravenes current federal guidance on COVID-19 immunization. Medscape Medical News

item.title: UK Clinicians Want Clearer AI Guidance and Oversight
item.description: AI adoption is growing in healthcare worldwide, but UK clinicians remain cautious, citing safety, trust, and system barriers as key concerns. Medscape...

item.title: New Obesity Framework in Europe Goes Beyond BMI Measurements
item.description: A new European obesity framework adds waist-to-height ratio and comorbidities to BMI assessment. Could this help identify patients who need interventi...

item.title: Fungal Meningitis Outbreak Traced to Epidurals From Mexico
item.description: Epidural anesthesia was the likely source of infections, half of which proved fatal. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Debate Over? RT vs Surgery in High-Risk Prostate Cancer
item.description: Radiotherapy with ADT outperforms radical prostatectomy strategies in reducing the risk for distant metastasis but results in similar overall survival...
